properties.name: cleanUpService.staleContracts.shelfLife
properties.description: Shelf life of each contract after it is signed by seller and before it gets signed by buyer.

properties.name: cleanUpService.staleContracts.rate
properties.description: The rate at witch the clean-up task should run.

properties.name: cleanUpService.staleContracts.lockAtLeastFor
properties.description: ShedLock parameter to lock task execution for nodes in the cluster at least for the given time, in milliseconds. This is to make up for time difference of the servers in the cluster.

properties.name: cleanUpService.staleContracts.lockAtMostFor
properties.description: ShedLock parameter to lock task execution for nodes in the cluster at most for the given time, in milliseconds. This is a safety net to unlock the scheduler in case of node failure.

properties.name: kafka.bootstrapAddress
properties.description: The address of the Kafka server.

properties.name: kafka.groups.contracts.id
properties.description: Kafka Group ID for contracts group.

properties.name: kafka.topics.contracts.numPartitions
properties.description: Number of kafka partitions for contract.

properties.name: kafka.topics.contracts.replicationFactor
properties.description: Kafka replication factor for contract messages.
